metadata.title: CVE-2021-23169 on Ubuntu 14.04 LTS (trusty) - negligible
metadata.description: A heap-buffer overflow was found in the copyIntoFrameBuffer function ofOpenEXR in versions before 3.0.1. An attacker could use this flaw toexecute arbitrary code with the permissions of the user running theapplication compiled against OpenEXR.

criterions.comment: openexr: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support').
